name: Witchling (Screaming Idiots)
description:
Witchling is a short horror game, made within three weeks as part of the #ThemedHorrorGameJam.

Chosen theme: Witching Hour

As the witch, you are confined in the nearby mines due to rumors of a hideous creature. 

You must be to blame.

Instead of just starving to death, you set out to seal the beast away with the aid of some of your spells.

To send the creature back to its domain,

 you must perform three rituals within the mine.  

However, be careful because the mines can be a little misleading

 to people who are unfamiliar with them.
